div.h3: "We at Lone Rock School, in partnership with the community, strive to empower ourselves with knowledge and become respectful contributing citizens."

p.strong: 1112 Three Mile Creek Road, Stevensville, MT 59870

div.a: CLICK HERE FOR ALL COVID-19 CLOSURE UPDATES

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: All Montana public schools have been directed by Governor Bullock not to hold classes on campus from March 16th through at least May 7th. Lone Rock School will comply with this directive.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: Please see THIS DOCUMENT for information about all closure-related updates, distance learning and our free meal delivery program during this closure.

li.a: CLICK HERE TO VIEW THE VIRTUAL OPEN HOUSE!!!

ul.li: The Yearbook order form is ready. Please print, fill out and return via mail or drop off.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: !!!!! Kindergarten registration update!!! Please call Marcia in the elem office to receive your packet. 777-3314 !!!!

ul.li: We are experiencing difficulty with our phone system. Please let us know through email if you can't get through on the phone. 4/7/2020

li.a: Information about the General Fund levy
Lone Rock School District #13 Resolution Under SB 307
Budget Amendment Proclamation Lone Rock School District #13

ul.li: Talking to your students about Coronavirus. Link to resources.

li.a: Montana Office of Public Education information page for Covid-19
State of Montana Covid-19 information page

ul.li: The Governor has extended the closure through April 10th.

li.a: Today is the filing deadline for trustee candidates. Click here for more information.

ul.li: Academic materials are available to pick up in the Old Gym on Weds, 3/18/2020 from 7am to 7pm.
Breakfast/Lunch delivery plan is in place. Please check the parent info document.
Classes are canceled from March 16 through March 27.

li.a: Please see this PARENT INFO document for meal delivery and academic distance learning.

ul.li: The District is accepting bids for gutter repairs on the New Gym. Please contact Scott Stiegler for more information. 2/4/2020

li.a: See a special article about Lone Rock Middle School from November 13, 2000.

ul.li: Check the Admin Event Calendar below to see what's coming up!!!
Excel: Please get next month's Red Envelopes to Mrs. Cartwright before the end of each month.
Registration for new students is open. Please contact Marcia in the Elementary Office at x200.
MS athletes: All sports physicals must be completed before your first MS practice. Click here:

ATTENTION ALL PARENTS, VOLUNTEERS, VENDORS AND OTHER GUESTS!!! Please follow this link to learn about how all guests will check-in at the school this fall through the RAPTOR VISITOR CHECK-IN SYSTEM!!!!! (August 1, 2019)
Lone Rock Surplus Inventory (Sale ends June 1, 2019)
Regular monthly School Board meetings are generally held on the third Tuesday of each month, unless specified.

div.p: Lone Rock School is located in the heart of the Bitterroot Valley, tucked up against the Sapphire Mountains.
We opened in 1885 and have been in continuous operation since. We are a Title I school and our student enrollment hovers around 195, with about 22 students per grade.
Our staff is dedicated to providing a healthy and enriching learning experience, in a very "family" setting.
